member.name: T:Fusion.RunnerAOIGizmos
member.summary: Add this Component to the NetworkRunner Prefab or GameObject. If Interest Management is enabled in NetworkProjectConfig ReplicationFeatures, gizmos will be shown that indicate active Area Of Interest cells. These gizmos are currently NOT applicable to Shared Mode and will only render for the Server/Host peer.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.IsSceneTakeOverEnabled
member.summary: If enabled and there is an already loaded scene that matches what the scene manager has intended to load, that scene will be used instead and load will be avoided.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.LogSceneLoadErrors
member.summary: Should all scene load errors be logged into the console? If disabled, errors can still be retrieved via the or .

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault._allOwnedScenes
member.summary: All the scenes loaded by all the managers. Used when is enabled.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault._multiPeerSceneRoots
member.summary: In multiple peer mode, each runner maintains its own scene where all the newly loaded scenes are moved to. This is to make sure physics are properly sandboxed.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault._runningCoroutines
member.summary: List of running coroutines. Only one is actually executed at a time.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault._tempUnloadScene
member.summary: For remote clients, this manager first unloads old scenes then loads the new ones. It might happen that all the current scenes need to be unloaded and in such case a temp scene needs to be created to ensure at least one scene loaded at all times.

member.name: P:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.MultiPeerScene
member.summary: Scene used when Multiple Peer mode is used. Each loaded scene is merged into this one, allowing for multiple runners to have separate cross-scene physics.

member.name: P:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.MultiPeerDontDestroyOnLoadRoot
member.summary: Root for DontDestroyOnLoad objects. Instantiated on .

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.AddressableScenesLabel
member.summary: A label by which addressable scenes can be discovered.

member.name: M:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.GetAddressableScenes
member.returns: A task representing resolve operation and optionally a delegate to be invoked before the task is going to be awaited synchronously

member.name: M:Fusion.NetworkSceneManagerDefault.GetAddressableScenePathsTimeout
member.summary: Returns the timeout for addressable scene paths to be resolved. By default, this method returns 10 seconds.

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionBootstrap
member.summary: A Fusion prototyping class for starting up basic networking. Add this component to your startup scene, and supply a . Can be set to automatically startup the network, display an in-game menu, or allow simplified start calls like .

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartModes
member.summary: Selection for how will behave at startup.

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.Stage
member.summary: The current stage of connection or shutdown.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.RunnerPrefab
member.summary: Supply a Prefab or a scene object which has the component on it, as well as any runner dependent components which implement , such as or your own custom INetworkInput implementations.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartMode
member.summary: Select how network startup will be triggered. Automatically, by in-game menu selection, or exclusively by script.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.AutoStartAs
member.summary: When is set to , this option selects if the will be started as a dedicated server, or as a host (which is a server with a local player).

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.AutoHideGUI
member.summary: will not render GUI elements while == .

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.AutoClients
member.summary: The number of client instances that will be created if running in Mulit-Peer Mode. When using the Select start mode, this number will be the default value for the additional clients option box.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.ClientStartDelay
member.summary: How long to wait after starting a peer before starting the next one.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.ServerPort
member.summary: The port that server/host will use.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.DefaultRoomName
member.summary: The default room name to use when connecting to photon cloud.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.InitialScenePath
member.summary: The Scene that will be loaded after network shutdown completes (all peers have disconnected). If this field is null or invalid, will be set to the current scene when runs Awake().

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap._currentStage
member.summary: Indicates which step of the startup process is currently in.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.AutoConnectVirtualInstances
member.summary: Requires Multiplayer Play Mode (MPPM) to be installed. If enabled, will automatically join the virtual instance.

member.name: F:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.VirtualInstanceConnectDelay
member.summary: How much to wait before the main instance lets the virtual instances connect.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.CurrentStage
member.summary: Indicates which step of the startup process is currently in.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.LastCreatedClientIndex
member.summary: The index number used for the last created peer.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.CurrentServerMode
member.summary: The server mode that was used for initial startup. Used to inform UI which client modes should be available.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartSinglePlayer
member.summary: Start a single player instance.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartServer
member.summary: Start a server instance.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartHost
member.summary: Start a host instance. This is a server instance, with a local player.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartClient
member.summary: Start a client instance.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartServerPlusClients
member.summary: Start a Fusion server instance, and the number of client instances indicated by . InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartHostPlusClients
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance, and the number of client instances indicated by . InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartServerPlusClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion server instance, and the indicated number of client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartHostPlusClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance (server with local player), and the indicated number of additional client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartMultipleClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance (server with local player), and the indicated number of additional client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.StartMultipleSharedClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start as Room on the Photon cloud, and connects as one or more clients.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionBootstrap.ShouldShowGUI
member.summary: Only show the GUI if the StartMode is set to UserInterface and not being run in a Virtual Instance (MPPM).

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionScalableIMGUI

member.summary: Modifies a skin to make it scale with screen height.

member.name: F:Fusion.NetworkObjectProviderDefault.DelayIfSceneManagerIsBusy
member.summary: If enabled, the provider will delay acquiring a prefab instance if the scene manager is busy.

member.name: T:Fusion.IRunnerVisibilityRecognizedType
member.summary: Flags a MonoBehaviour class as a RunnerVisibilityControl recognized type. Will be included in runner visibility handling, and will be found by component finds.

member.name: T:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink
member.summary: Identifies visible/audible components (such as renderers, canvases, lights) that should be enabled/disabled by runner visibility handling. Automatically added to scene objects and spawned objects during play if running in . Additionally this component can be added manually at development time to identify specific Behaviours or Renderers you would like to restrict to one enabled copy at a time.

member.name: T:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunners
member.summary: The peer runner that will be used if more than one runner is visible, and this node was manually added by developer (indicating only one instance should be visible at a time).

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunners.Auto
member.summary: The first visible runner will be used.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunners.Server
member.summary: The server peer/runner will be used if visible.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunners.Client
member.summary: The first client peer/runner will be used if visible.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunners.InputAuthority
member.summary: The components will only be enabled on the instance that has input authority over the NetworkObject. Unlike the other options, this expects a NetworkObject to work and it will search its children and parents for it.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.PreferredRunner
member.summary: If more than one runner instance is visible, this indicates which peer's clone of this entity should be visible.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.Component
member.summary: The associated component with this node. This Behaviour or Renderer will be enabled/disabled when its NetworkRunner.IsVisible value is changed.

member.name: F:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.Guid
member.summary: Guid is used for common objects (user flagged components that should only run in one instance), to identify matching clones.

member.name: P:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.DefaultState
member.summary: Set to false to indicate that this object should remain disabled even when is set to true.

member.name: M:Fusion.RunnerVisibilityLink.SetEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the visibility state of this node.
